item.title: WATCH: Israel says it plans to double size of West Bank settlement
item.description: In response to countries recognizing Palestine as a state, Israel says it plans to expand one of its West Bank settlements.

item.title: 4.3 magnitude earthquake jolts San Francisco Bay Area, people report feeling shake
item.description: An earthquake with a magnitude of 4.3 has awakened a number of people in the San Francisco Bay Area with a sharp jolt
